title: Spring and All by William Carlos Williams

content.description:
In the following poem by William Carlos Williams (published in 1921), the speaker describes a scene from a day in late winter. Read the poem carefully. Write a paragraph in which you make a defensible claim about how Williams uses poetic elements and techniques to convey the speaker’s complex perspective on the approach of spring. In your paragraph, you should incorporate at least one piece of evidence from the text to support your claim.

In your response you should do the following:

Construct a claim that presents an interpretation.

Select and use evidence to develop and support your interpretation.

Explain the relationship between the evidence and your interpretation.

Use appropriate grammar and punctuation in communicating your argument.
